summary: Female racemenu preset for Susan Slaughter from popular SyFy channel reality shows ghost hunters international and ghost hunters academy.
descriptionHtml:
[b]==DESCRIPTION==
This mod is a custom racemenu preset for the female nord (and your character MUST be a female nord) that includes the likeness of a gorgeous and buxom long-haired brunette vixen named Susan Slaughter, who is from the hit SyFy channel reality television shows "ghost hunters academy" and "ghost hunters international,"

I am currently fine-tuning her appearance so expect new versions to be uploaded in the
coming days. I may need some new eyebrows.[/b]

[color=#00ff00]===INSTALLATION===
[b]Step 1. After downloading this file, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the file susan slaughter preset.jslot into there.

Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen, and press F9 to load presets and load "Susan Slaughter Preset.jslot" (it should be in there) and voila, there you are![/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.2 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation Pack <---- XCE Compilation Pack is not 100% necessary but is strongly recommended!
*The Eyes Of Beauty - The Eyes Of Beauty Player (for the dark green eyes)
*True Brows
*Apachii Skyhair
*SG Hair Pack 268 By HelloSanta

Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly![/color]

[color=#00ffff][b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b]

===Important Notes===
When wearing a helmet, your hair completely disappears, this is a problem
with the female hair pack that is included with the cumshot brothel.[/color]
author: Kutt
